data.Sentence_cn: 我走进饭店经理的办公室，坐了下来。
data.Sentence: I entered the hotel manager's office and sat down.

data.Sentence_cn: 我刚刚丢了50英镑，感到非常烦恼。
data.Sentence: I had just lost £50 and I felt very upset.

data.Sentence_cn: “我把钱放在房间里，”我说，“可现在没有了。”
data.Sentence: 'I left the money in my room,' I said, 'and it's not there now.'

data.Sentence_cn: 经理深表同情，但却无能为力。
data.Sentence: The manager was sympathetic, but he could do nothing.
'Everyone's losing money these days,' he said.

data.Sentence_cn: 他开始抱怨起这个邪恶的世道来，却被一阵敲门声打断了。
data.Sentence: He started to complain about this wicked world but was interrupted by a knock at the door.

data.Sentence_cn: 一个姑娘走了进来，把一个信封放在了他桌上。
data.Sentence: A girl came in and put an envelope on his desk.

data.Sentence_cn: “这是我在这位先生的房门外捡到的，”她说。
data.Sentence: 'I found this outside this gentleman's room,' she said.

data.Sentence_cn: “是啊，”我对那位经理说，“这世界上还是有诚实可言的！”
data.Sentence: 'Well,' I said to the manager, 'there is still some honesty in this world!'
